result.eng: We built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ga: thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.orig: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.html: thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ponchtml: ṫógamar claíṫe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saiġdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.

result.ga: bhí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.orig: Bhí Meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.html: bhí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.
result.ponchtml: ḃí meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí osama bin laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceá
result.orig: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.html: thaistil sé chun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: ṫaistil sé ċun na hafganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta osama bin laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i meiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: The second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ga: d'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.orig: D'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreach
result.html: d'athraigh an dara ionsaí an tír láithreachThe second attack changed the country instantly.
result.ponchtml: d'aṫraiġ an dara ionsaí an tír láiṫreaċThe second attack changed the country instantly.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san afganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san afganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór

result.html: táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú meán fomhair ach leithscéal do mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú meán foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
